info.title: Track
info.description: The Tracking API supports Package, Ground Freight and Air Freight shipments.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Track , Error Codes and Appendix

parameters.name: AccessLicenseNumber
parameters.description:
Authorization: Access Key obtained 
through on-boarding process. 
Contact your UPS representative for 
additional information. Maximum Length:16

parameters.name: transId
parameters.description: An identifier unique to the request. Length 32

parameters.name: transactionSrc
parameters.description: An identifier of the client/source application that is making the request.Length 512

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description:
The language and country code combination. If 
not provided will default to ï¿½en_USï¿½.. Length 5

parameters.name: inquiryNumber
parameters.description:
The tracking number for which tracking 
information is requested. The number must be 
between 7 and 34 characters in length.Max Length 34

InquiryNumber.description:
Inquiry Number. 

Package:
For package, the number will be treated as Shipment Identification Number or Package Tracking Number based on the value of the element TrackingOption. 

Tracking options: 
01, the inquiry number will be treated as shipment identification number.
02, the inquiry number will be treated as package Tracking number. 

Freight:
For freight, the number will be always treated as the tracking number of the shipment regardless of the value of the TrackingOption.  

Mail Innovations:
For mail innovations this number will be the tracking number. When tracking for mail innovations by tracking number the TrackingOption also needs to be set to03.

For mail innovations different types of tracking numbers apply like - Sequence number (Mail Manifest ID / MMS), Postal service Tracking ID.

IncludeMailInnovationIndicator.description: The presence of this indicator means supports Mail Innovation tracking without tracking option

TrackingOption.description:
TrackingOption applies to Package and Mail Innovations only.

Package:
01 - Single trackable entity with more trackable entities inside it
02 - Single trackable entity with no more trackable entities inside it

If value or element is not found, then Inquiry number will be treated as Shipment Identification Number.

If the TrackingOption is not present then it will return all packages information if it is a Multi-package shipment (Which means Tracking number will be treated as Shipment Identification number). 
Freight:

Freight:
For Freight, This element will be ignored and the Inquiry number will always be treated as Shipment Identification Number. 

For Freight Inquiry Number this field will not be used so all the information about that freight shipment will be returned. 

Mail Innovations:
For Mail Innovations track by number, this is a mandatory field which has to be set to 03. 
For Mail Innovations a single shipment has single package.

CandidateBookmark.description:
During InquiryNumber and Reference Number searches, it is possible that duplicate shipments will be found. If duplicate shipments are found, then a Candidate Summary with a corresponding CandidateBookmark for each of the Shipments will be returned in the track response. 

This Base64 encoded CandidateBookmark can be passed back to the Tracking service in a separate request to retrieve tracking information about the particular shipment of interest. It does not apply to package tracking or Mail Innovations.

ShipperNumber.description: The UPS account number used to narrow a reference number search.

PreauthorizedReturnIndicator.description:
Indicator to request Pre-authorized For Return (PFR) eligibility information, URL to submit pre-authorized return request and other PFR related data. For small package and Mail Innovation packages.
Valid value is:
Y - PFR information is required.

Locale.description:
Locale will be used to provide translated text in Activity Status Description and Current Status Description.
Default Value is:
en_US

TrackRequest.description:
Container for the root Track Request. Package, Mail Innovations and freight shipment can be tracked by invoking this request. 

Users have three ways to track, by inquiry number, by reference number, or by candidate bookmark. Candidate bookmark applies to Freight tracking only.

SubVersion.description:
When UPS introduces new elements in the response that are not associated with new request elements, Subversion is used. This ensures backward compatibility.

To get such elements you need to have the right Subversion. The value of the subversion is explained in the Response element Description.


Example: Itemized Charges are returned only when the Subversion element is present and greater than or equal to '1601'. 

Format: YYMM = Year and month of the release.
Example: 1601 = 2016 January

TrackRequest_Request.description: Common Request element should be provided by users

Request_SubVersion.description:
When UPS introduces new elements in the response that are not associated with new request elements, Subversion is used. This ensures backward compatibility.

To get such elements you need to have the right Subversion. The value of the subversion is explained in the Response element Description.


Example: Itemized Charges are returned only when the Subversion element is present and greater than or equal to '1601'. 

Format: YYMM = Year and month of the release.
Example: 1601 = 2016 January

CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext Information which will be echoed during response.

TransactionIdentifier.description: The Unique TransactionIdentifier Information for that transaction. This will be present only if requested in the request.

Request_TransactionReference.description: TransactionReference identifies transactions between client and server.

TransactionReference_CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext Information which will be echoed during response.

TransactionReference_TransactionIdentifi.description: The Unique TransactionIdentifier Information for that transaction. This will be present only if requested in the request.

TrackRequest_InquiryNumber.description:
Inquiry Number. 

Package:
For package, the number will be treated as Shipment Identification Number or Package Tracking Number based on the value of the element TrackingOption. 

Tracking options: 
01, the inquiry number will be treated as shipment identification number.
02, the inquiry number will be treated as package Tracking number. 

Freight:
For freight, the number will be always treated as the tracking number of the shipment regardless of the value of the TrackingOption.  

Mail Innovations:
For mail innovations this number will be the tracking number. When tracking for mail innovations by tracking number the TrackingOption also needs to be set to03.

For mail innovations different types of tracking numbers apply like - Sequence number (Mail Manifest ID / MMS), Postal service Tracking ID.

TrackRequest_IncludeMailInnovationIndica.description: The presence of this indicator means supports Mail Innovation tracking without tracking option

TrackRequest_TrackingOption.description:
TrackingOption applies to Package and Mail Innovations only.

Package:
01 - Single trackable entity with more trackable entities inside it
02 - Single trackable entity with no more trackable entities inside it

If value or element is not found, then Inquiry number will be treated as Shipment Identification Number.

If the TrackingOption is not present then it will return all packages information if it is a Multi-package shipment (Which means Tracking number will be treated as Shipment Identification number). 
Freight:

Freight:
For Freight, This element will be ignored and the Inquiry number will always be treated as Shipment Identification Number. 

For Freight Inquiry Number this field will not be used so all the information about that freight shipment will be returned. 

Mail Innovations:
For Mail Innovations track by number, this is a mandatory field which has to be set to 03. 
For Mail Innovations a single shipment has single package.

TrackRequest_CandidateBookmark.description:
During InquiryNumber and Reference Number searches, it is possible that duplicate shipments will be found. If duplicate shipments are found, then a Candidate Summary with a corresponding CandidateBookmark for each of the Shipments will be returned in the track response. 

This Base64 encoded CandidateBookmark can be passed back to the Tracking service in a separate request to retrieve tracking information about the particular shipment of interest. It does not apply to package tracking or Mail Innovations.

TrackRequest_ReferenceNumber.description:
The reference number container. Required if an inquiry number or candidate bookmark is not present. 
The reference number for Mail Innovations needs to be set here along with appropriate code in ShipmentType.

BeginDate.description:
The beginning pickup date used to narrow a reference number search. 
Format: YYYYMMDD.

EndDate.description:
The end pickup date used to narrow a reference number search. 
Format: YYYYMMDD. MM ranges from 01 to 12.

TrackRequest_PickupDateRange.description:
The additional information of pickup date range to support and narrow a reference number search. 
For Mail Innovations this is optional field for tracking by reference number.

PickupDateRange_BeginDate.description:
The beginning pickup date used to narrow a reference number search. 
Format: YYYYMMDD.

PickupDateRange_EndDate.description:
The end pickup date used to narrow a reference number search. 
Format: YYYYMMDD. MM ranges from 01 to 12.

TrackRequest_ShipperNumber.description: The UPS account number used to narrow a reference number search.

TrackRequest_ShipFrom.description: Container for ship from address used to narrow a reference number search.

CountryCode.description: Activity locations country or territory code.

ShipFrom_Address.description: Container for the origin country or territory code and origin postal code used to narrow a reference number search.

Address_CountryCode.description: Activity locations country or territory code.

TrackRequest_ShipTo.description: Container for the Destination Address to narrow the reference number search.

CountryCode.description: Activity locations country or territory code.

ShipTo_Address.description: Container for the destination postal code and destination country or territory Code

Code.description:
This element will be used to indicate the type of the shipment being tracked, either Package, Mail Innovations or Freight.
01 - Package
02 - Freight
03 - Mail Innovations

TrackRequest_ShipmentType.description: Container for the type of Shipment when doing a Reference Number search. This element is required if the Reference Number element is specified.

ShipmentType_Code.description:
This element will be used to indicate the type of the shipment being tracked, either Package, Mail Innovations or Freight.
01 - Package
02 - Freight
03 - Mail Innovations

PostalCode.description:
Postal Code of the Shipper Account used to place the shipment. 

This data will be used in verifying the rights of the customer to view signature results.

CountryCode.description:
Country or Territory Code of the Shipper Account used to place the shipment. 

This data will be used in verifying the rights of the customer to view signature results.

TrackRequest_ShipperAccountInfo.description:
Container for Shippers account details.

Used to verify the customers signature tracking privileges for package tracking if shipper selects one of the RequestOption including signature track.

ShipperAccountInfo_PostalCode.description:
Postal Code of the Shipper Account used to place the shipment. 

This data will be used in verifying the rights of the customer to view signature results.

ShipperAccountInfo_CountryCode.description:
Country or Territory Code of the Shipper Account used to place the shipment. 

This data will be used in verifying the rights of the customer to view signature results.

RecipientEmailAddress.description: The recipient email address for sending notification email.

FailureEmailAddress.description: The email address used when recipient email address is not reachable.

ExceptionNotificationIndicator.description:
If an exception notification is requested, this indicator must be set.
Both exception notification indicator and delivery notification indicator can be set if needed. At least 1 indicator must be set.

DeliveryNotificationIndicator.description: If a delivery notification is requested, this indicator must be set.

TrackRequest_QuantumViewNotification.description:
Container for supplying quantum view notification.
This container applies only when the track request is by inquiry number.

QuantumViewNotification_RecipientEmailAd.description: The recipient email address for sending notification email.

QuantumViewNotification_FailureEmailAddr.description: The email address used when recipient email address is not reachable.

Code.description:
The two-character long language code in lower case such as en.
For a list of valid language dialect pairs supported for Quantum View Notification, please refer to the Language-Dialect combination table in the Appendix.

Dialect.description: The two-character long dialect code in upper case such as US.

QuantumViewNotification_Language.description: Container for supplying the language information for quantum view notification

Language_Code.description:
The two-character long language code in lower case such as en.
For a list of valid language dialect pairs supported for Quantum View Notification, please refer to the Language-Dialect combination table in the Appendix.

Language_Dialect.description: The two-character long dialect code in upper case such as US.

QuantumViewNotification_ExceptionNotific.description:
If an exception notification is requested, this indicator must be set.
Both exception notification indicator and delivery notification indicator can be set if needed. At least 1 indicator must be set.

QuantumViewNotification_DeliveryNotifica.description: If a delivery notification is requested, this indicator must be set.

TrackRequest_PreauthorizedReturnIndicato.description:
Indicator to request Pre-authorized For Return (PFR) eligibility information, URL to submit pre-authorized return request and other PFR related data. For small package and Mail Innovation packages.
Valid value is:
Y - PFR information is required.

TrackRequest_Locale.description:
Locale will be used to provide translated text in Activity Status Description and Current Status Description.
Default Value is:
en_US

Code.description:
Identifies the success or failure of the transaction. 
1 = Successful
0 = Failure

Description.description: Describes Response Status Code. Returns text of Success.

ResponseStatus_Code.description:
Identifies the success or failure of the transaction. 
1 = Successful
0 = Failure

ResponseStatus_Description.description: Describes Response Status Code. Returns text of Success.

Code.description: Warning code returned by the system.

Description.description: Warning messages returned by the system

Response_Alert.description: Alert Container. There can be zero to many alert containers with code and description.

Alert_Code.description: Warning code returned by the system.

Alert_Description.description: Warning messages returned by the system

CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext Information which will be echoed during response.

TransactionIdentifier.description: The Unique TransactionIdentifier Information for that transaction. This will be present only if requested in the request.

CandidateBookmark.description:
During Tracking and Reference Number searches, it is possible that duplicate shipments will be found. 

If duplicate shipments are found, then a Candidate Summary with a corresponding Base64 encodedCandidate Bookmark for each of the Shipments will be returned in the response. 

The Candidate Bookmark can be passed back to the tracking web service in a separate track transaction to retrieve tracking information about the particular shipment of interest.

ShipperNumber.description: The shippers UPS account number that placed this shipment

PickupDate.description: Date the shipment was picked-up. Format: YYYYMMDD

BillToName.description: Name of the person to whom the shipment is billed to.

SignedForByName.description: Person that received the shipment. May be the addressee, or another person that signed for the shipment

DescriptionOfGoods.description: Description of Goods in the shipment.

Code.description:
Code to indicate the type of Inquiry Number. 

Package:
For package this element returns: 
01 -Shipment Identification Number

Mail Innovations: 
03- Mail Innovation tracking number

Freight:
HAWB - House Airway Bill
HBL - House Bill of Lading
PRO ï¿½ PRO Number
SUBPRO ï¿½ Sub-PRO Number
DO ï¿½ Delivery Order

Description.description: Description of the Inquiry Number as indicated by code as above.

Value.description: The actual value of the Inquiry Number.

Package:

Mail Innovations:

Freight:

HBL - House Bill of Lading
PRO ï¿½ PRO Number
SUBPRO ï¿½ Sub-PRO Number
DO ï¿½ Delivery Order

Code.description:
This element will be used to indicate the type of the shipment being tracked, either Package, Mail Innovations or Freight.
01 - Package
02 - Freight
03 - Mail Innovations

During Tracking and Reference Number searches, it is possible that duplicate shipments will be found. 

If duplicate shipments are found, then a Candidate Summary with a corresponding Base64 encodedCandidate Bookmark for each of the Shipments will be returned in the response. 

The Candidate Bookmark can be passed back to the tracking web service in a separate track transaction to retrieve tracking information about the particular shipment of interest.

Weight.description: Shipmentï¿½s total weight. Set to 0 for shipment with package type of letter.

Content.description: Base64 Encoded PODLetter in html format or the customer's name for Electronic Delivery Notice.

Shipment_Document.description:
Container for the various documents returned to the customer.

Returned if Signature Tracking is enabled and authorized.
Returned if any of the documents i.e., Signature, Free Astrays, Delivery Receipt or POD is requested using the request option. 
Not returned for documents like SCS Freight, UPS Freight TL/LTL.

Refer to the Request Option Matrix in the Appendix.

Code.description:
Code of Document Type.
04 - POD Letter
05 - Electronic Delivery Letter
**Returned if customer has authorized release of the package with the signature.

Document_Content.description: Base64 Encoded PODLetter in html format or the customer's name for Electronic Delivery Notice.

Format code of the content.
03 - HTML
04 - Plain text

Description.description:
Description of Format code above. 
Plain text format will only apply if the code above is 04.

Format_Code.description:
Format code of the content.
03 - HTML
04 - Plain text

Description of Format code above. 
Plain text format will only apply if the code above is 04.

04 = R - Commercial Invoice Removal Requested or S - Commercial Invoice Removal Success. 
06 = USPS Package Identification number that is returned for UPS Returns Flexible Access Shipments.
07 = The specific product description. 
09 = R ï¿½ Return Exchange Requested or S - Exchange Completed.

Value.description: This contains value of the alternate tracking number.

AlternateTrackingInfo_Value.description: This contains value of the alternate tracking number.

AddressLine.description: Activity locationï¿½s street address including name and number (when applicable) and/or building floor, room, suite, and PO Box number. Up to three AddressLine can be returned.

City.description: City name. This is optional for Mail Innovations

StateProvinceCode.description: Activity locationï¿½s state or province code. This is optional for Mail Innovations.

CountryCode.description: Activity locations country or territory code.

Type.description: Type of facility for Mail Innovations shipment.

Code.description: This code is associated with the Mail Innovations facility.

ActivityLocation_TransportFacility.description: This container is for storing the type and code of the transport facility associated with the Mail Innovations activity.

TransportFacility_Type.description: Type of facility for Mail Innovations shipment.

TransportFacility_Code.description: This code is associated with the Mail Innovations facility.

ActivityLocation_SignedForByName.description: Name of the person who signed.

Type.description:
Type of activity status:
I = In Transit
D = Delivered
X = Exception
P = Pickup
M = Manifest Pickup.

Code.description: The status code.

Status_Type.description:
Type of activity status:
I = In Transit
D = Delivered
X = Exception
P = Pickup
M = Manifest Pickup.

Activity_DeliveryDateFromManifestIndicat.description:
The presence of this indicator means manifest information is available and used to calculate the expected delivery date. 
This will be available when Track sub version >=1507

Date.description:
Date of activity. 
Military format: YYYYMMDD

Time.description:
Time of activity.
Military format: HHMMSS or HHMM

Activity_NextScheduleActivity.description:
Container tag to describe when the next schedule activity will occur.
Note: This container is return if SubVersion is 0114 and above

NextScheduleActivity_Date.description:
Date of activity. 
Military format: YYYYMMDD

NextScheduleActivity_Time.description:
Time of activity.
Military format: HHMMSS or HHMM

Activity_GMTDate.description:
Date of activity. Format: YYYY-MM-DD
Note: This container is return if SubVersion is 1907 and above.

Activity_GMTTime.description:
Time of activity. Format: hh:mm:ss or hh:mm
Note: This container is return if SubVersion is 1907 and above.

Activity_GMTOffset.description:
GMT Offset of activity for the time zone. Format: (+/-)hh:mm
Note: This container is return if SubVersion is 1907 and above.

Content.description: Base64 Encoded PODLetter in html format or the customer's name for Electronic Delivery Notice.

Activity_Document.description:
Documents at package activity level.
Example: PODLetter

Refer to the Request Option Matrix in the Appendix.

Code.description: Code describing what type of message the customer can receive.

Message_Code.description: Code describing what type of message the customer can receive.

Weight.description: Packages weight. Set to 0 for package type of letters.

Code.description: Package weight unit of measurement code.

Description.description: Description of the package weight measurement units.

PackageWeight_UnitOfMeasurement.description: Container for package weight unit of measurement.

PackageWeight_Weight.description: Packages weight. Set to 0 for package type of letters.

Code.description: Package Reference number type code. The code specifies the Reference name.

Package_ReferenceNumber.description: Container for package reference number. Up to 20 reference numbers can be returned.

Package_AlternateTrackingNumber.description: Alternate tracking number returned for this package.

Value.description: This contains value of the alternate tracking number.

Package_AlternateTrackingInfo.description: Alternate tracking number returned for this package.

Package_DimensionalWeightScanIndicator.description:
Present if Dimensional Weight Scan is used to recalculate schedule delivery date.
Note: This Indicator is return if SubVersion is 1407 and above.

ReturnEligibilityIndicator.description:
Contains Eligibility of the original package to initiate the ï¿½return processï¿½ via the given url.
Valid values are :
Y - Eligible
N - Not Eligible

ReturnExpirationDate.description: Contains the last date at which the original package can request a ï¿½return processï¿½ via the given url.

ReturnRequestURL.description: Contains the url that can be used to initiate the ï¿½return processï¿½.

OriginalTrackingNumber.description: Contains the tracking number of the original package.

ReturnTrackingNumber.description: Contains the tracking number of the return package.

Package_PreauthorizedReturnInformation.description: Container for the Pre-authorized For Return Information. If this information is requested and available, then this container will be populated for small packages and Mail Innovation packages.

PreauthorizedReturnInformation_ReturnEli.description:
Contains Eligibility of the original package to initiate the ï¿½return processï¿½ via the given url.
Valid values are :
Y - Eligible
N - Not Eligible

PreauthorizedReturnInformation_ReturnExp.description: Contains the last date at which the original package can request a ï¿½return processï¿½ via the given url.

PreauthorizedReturnInformation_ReturnReq.description: Contains the url that can be used to initiate the ï¿½return processï¿½.

PreauthorizedReturnInformation_OriginalT.description: Contains the tracking number of the original package.

PreauthorizedReturnInformation_ReturnTra.description: Contains the tracking number of the return package.

Shipment_QuantumViewNotification.description: Container returned when quantum view notification is requested.

Code.description: The status code.

QuantumViewNotification_Status.description: Container returning the quantum view notification status information.

Code.description:
Distinct code for the error returned.   
Possible error codes and descriptions are: 
- QVN1001 The provided failure email address is not in the proper format. 
- QVN1002 The failure email address exceeds the maximum character limit.
- QVN1005 The language code must be two-character long
- QVN1007 The language dialect must be two-character long  
- QVN1003 The provided Recipient Email Address is not in the proper format.
- QVN1004 The Recipient Email Address exceeds the maximum character limit.
- QVN1005 The language code must be two-character long. 
- QVN1007 The language dialect must be two-character long.  
- QVN1008 The language code and language dialect pair is invalid. 
- QVN1009 The package is delivered QVN1010 Unknown Error

Description.description: Description of the error, see above.

TrackingNumber.description: The tracking number of the package to which this failure detail applies to.

QuantumViewNotification_FailureDetail.description: Details of the errors occurred while requesting QV notification.

FailureDetail_Code.description:
Distinct code for the error returned.   
Possible error codes and descriptions are: 
- QVN1001 The provided failure email address is not in the proper format. 
- QVN1002 The failure email address exceeds the maximum character limit.
- QVN1005 The language code must be two-character long
- QVN1007 The language dialect must be two-character long  
- QVN1003 The provided Recipient Email Address is not in the proper format.
- QVN1004 The Recipient Email Address exceeds the maximum character limit.
- QVN1005 The language code must be two-character long. 
- QVN1007 The language dialect must be two-character long.  
- QVN1008 The language code and language dialect pair is invalid. 
- QVN1009 The package is delivered QVN1010 Unknown Error

FailureDetail_Description.description: Description of the error, see above.

FailureDetail_TrackingNumber.description: The tracking number of the package to which this failure detail applies to.
